mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_addr_head.select */ SELECT word_head_1 /* word_head_1 단어_헤더_1 character varying(30) */ ,word_head_2 /* word_head_2 단어_헤더_2 character varying(30) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_addr_head WHERE 1 = 1 AND word_head_1 = #{wordHead1} /* word_head_1 단어_헤더_1 character varying(30) */ AND word_head_2 = #{wordHead2} /* word_head_2 단어_헤더_2 character varying(30) */
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_addr_head.update */ UPDATE ti_addr_head
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND word_head_1 = #{wordHead1} /* word_head_1 단어_헤더_1 character varying(30) */ AND word_head_2 = #{wordHead2} /* word_head_2 단어_헤더_2 character varying(30) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_addr_head.merge */ INSERT INTO ti_addr_head ( word_head_1 /* word_head_1 단어_헤더_1 character varying(30) */ word_head_2 /* word_head_2 단어_헤더_2 character varying(30) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{wordHead1} /* word_head_1 단어_헤더_1 character varying(30) */ #{wordHead2} /* word_head_2 단어_헤더_2 character varying(30) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_addr_head.delete */ DELETE FROM ti_addr_head WHERE 1 = 1 AND word_head_1 = #{wordHead1} /* word_head_1 단어_헤더_1 character varying(30) */ AND word_head_2 = #{wordHead2} /* word_head_2 단어_헤더_2 character varying(30) */
